item.description:
Fall Open Studios Tour #2!

Let's meet up and wander....... Because Open Studios cover so many studios and galleries, I'll create a poll to help direct where we go.

This year, on September 27 & 28, 2008, we will be celebrating our 15th annual Open Studios. This weekend is a wonderful chance to meet artists, tour their studios, explore new artworks and media and purchase pieces for your home and office directly from the artists. Take a walking tour of Jamaica Plain and the JP Arts Community!

Note: the Meetup photo is by JP artist Shaun Provencher, who will be participating in JPOS.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a purple flower pin.
item.name: Jamaica Plain Open Studios
